questions.question: Does scrum have rules, or just guidelines?
answers: Scrum has a few simple rules
Scrum has guidelines only, no rules at all.

questions.question: When should a retrospective meeting be held?
answers: At the end of each sprint, after the sprint review meeting
At the end of each sprint, before the sprint review meeting
Every now and then, when the team wants to improve
Only at the end of a project
